adjectives.description: niggardly (comparative more niggardly, superlative most niggardly)

entries.meaning: Withholding for the sake of meanness; stingy, miserly.
examples: Synonyms: miserly, stingy; see also Thesaurus:stingy

adverbs.description: niggardly (comparative more niggardly, superlative most niggardly)

entries.meaning: (now rare) In a parsimonious way; sparingly, stingily.
examples: because many families are compelled to live niggardly, exhaust and undone by great dowers, none shall be given at all, or very little […].
